faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What are board resolutions drafts in the UAE?
items.answer: A board resolution draft is a tailored document that formalises key business decisions and actions taken by the board of directors.

items.question: Why do UAE board resolution drafts matter?
items.answer: A professional board resolution empowers businesses to simplify decision-making, uphold legality, ensure accountability, and promote transparency.

items.question: How long does it take to draft a resolution?
items.answer: Our skilled attorneys can draft and finalise your board resolutions in 24-48 hours, depending on the complexity of the decision.

items.question: Can I draft a board resolution myself?
items.answer: Yes, but self-drafting resolutions can come with the risk of non-compliance, ambiguous clauses, and costly rejections.

items.question: What happens if a board resolution is incorrect or incomplete?
items.answer: Errors in a board resolution can invalidate the resolution, delay regulatory approvals, trigger hefty fines, or even expose directors to liability.
